summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mael Kahilu's 3D animated portfolio site. All core features working perfectly including Three.js space theme, navigation, sections, modal functionality, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Three.js canvas renders with animated star field
Hero section with avatar, title, description, and CTA buttons
Navigation links scroll to correct sections (all 5 sections)
About section displays profile info and 3 statistics
Skills section displays all 10 skills with icons
Projects section displays all 6 projects with images and links
Project modal functionality (open/close with 'En savoir plus')
Contact form with all fields (name, email, message, submit)
Scroll progress indicator (5 dots, hidden on mobile)
GSAP scroll animations for all sections
Typing animation effect in hero title
Glass panel design effects throughout site
